juzs.text: Ubutagatifu ni ubwa (Allah), ufite ubwami (bwose) mu kuboko kwe, kandi ni Ushobora byose
Ni we waremye urupfu n’ubuzima kugira ngo abagerageze (hanyuma amenye) ukora ibikorwa byiza kurusha abandi muri mwe, kandi ni Umunyembaraga uhebuje, Ubabarira ibyaha
Ni we waremye ibirere birindwi bigerekeranye. Ntushobora kubona inenge mu byo (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe yaremye. Ngaho ongera wubure amaso (urebe); ese hari inenge ubona
Hanyuma wongere wubure amaso ubugira kabiri, amaso aragaruka yamwaye kandi yacitse intege
Rwose ikirere cyegereye isi twagitakishije amatara (inyenyeri), tunayagira nk’ibisasu bya Misile byo gutera za shitani (zigometse), kandi twanaziteguriye igihano cy’umuriro ugurumana
Abahakanye Nyagasani wabo bazahanishwa ibihano by’umuriro wa Jahanamu, kandi iryo ni ryo garukiro ribi
Ubwo bazaba bajugunywemo (mu muriro wa Jahanamu), bazumva utogota kandi ubira
(Uwo muriro) uzaba wenda gusandara kubera umujinya (ufitiye abanyabyaha)! Buri uko agatsiko kazajya kawujugunywamo, abarinzi bawo bazajya bakabaza bati "Ese nta muburizi wabagezeho
Bazavuga bati "Yego! Rwose umuburizi yatugezeho ariko twaramuhinyuye, turanavuga tuti " Allah nta kintu yigeze ahishura, tuti ahubwo mwe muri mu buyobe buhambaye
Bazanavuga bati "Iyo tuza kumva cyangwa tukanatekereza, ntitwari kuba mu bo mu muriro ugurumana
Baziyemerera ibyaha byabo (ariko ntacyo bizabamarira). Bityo, ukorama nikube ku bantu bo mu muriro ugurumana
Mu by’ukuri, abatinya Nyagasani wabo batamubona, bazababarirwa ibyaha ndetse banahabwe ibihembo bihebuje
Kandi ibiganiro byanyu mwabikorera mu bwiru cyangwa mukabigaragaza, mu by’ukuri (Allah) ni Umumenyi uhebuje w’ibiri mu bituza (by’abantu)
Ese Uwaremye yayoberwa (ibyo yaremye)? Kandi ni we Uworohera (ibiremwa bye), Uzi byimazeyo (buri kintu)
Ni we waborohereje isi; ngaho nimutambagire mu mpande zayo (zinyuranye), ndetse murye mu mafunguro ye (Allah). Kandi iwe ni ho muzazurirwa
Ese muratekanye (yemwe bahakanyi) ku buryo (mwizeye ko) uri mu Ijuru (Allah) atatigisa isi maze mukarigitamo
Cyangwa se muratekanye ku buryo (mwizeye ko) uri mu Ijuru ataboherereza inkubi y’umuyaga uvanze n’amabuye (wabarimbura mwese)? Ubwo ni bwo muzamenya uko ukuburira kwanjye (kumeze)
Rwose ababayeho mbere yabo (abahakanyi b’i Maka) barahinyuye. Mbega uko uburakari bwanjye bwari bumeze
Ese ntibabona ibiguruka (inyoni) hejuru yabo uko biguruka birambura amababa yabyo bikanayahina? Nta wubifata (ngo bitagwa hasi) usibye (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe. Mu by’ukuri, ni Ubona bihebuje buri kintu
Ahubwo se ni nde wababera ingabo (yemwe bahakanyi) ngo abatabare usibye (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe? Nyamara Abahakanyi baribeshya
Cyangwa se ni nde wabaha amafunguro, (Allah) aramutse ahagaritse amafunguro ye? Ahubwo (abahakanyi) bakomeje kwinangira no kwanga (ukuri)
Ese wawundi ugenda yubitse umutwe (ahuzagurika) ni we wayobotse kurusha wawundi ugenda yemye mu nzira igororotse
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "(Allah) ni we wabaremye, abaha ukumva (amatwi), amaso n’imitima (ibafasha gutekereza); ariko mushimira gake
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ni we wabakwirakwije ku isi, kandi iwe ni ho muzakoranyirizwa
Baranavuga bati "Ese iryo sezerano (izuka) rizaba ryari, niba koko muri abanyakuri
Vuga uti "Mu by’ukuri, ubumenyi (bw’igihe iryo zuka rizabera) buri kwa Allah, kandi njye ndi umuburizi ugaragara
Ariko ubwo bazabibona (ibihano byo ku munsi w’imperuka) biri hafi, uburanga bw’abahakanye buzijima bugire agahinda, maze babwirwe bati "Ngibi ibyo mwajyaga musaba (ngaho byaje)

Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Nimumbwire! Allah ashatse kunyoreka njye n’abo turi kumwe (nk’uko mubyifuza) cyangwa akatugirira impuhwe (ibyo ntacyo byabamarira). Ni nde warinda abahakanyi ibihano bibabaza
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ni we (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe, twaramwemeye kandi ni na we twiringira. Vuba aha muzamenya uri mu buyobe bugaragara (ibihano nibigera)
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Nimumbwire! Amazi yanyu aramutse arigitiye ikuzimu (agakama), ni nde (utari Allah) wabagarurira amazi (y’isoko) atemba
Nuuni139 Ndahiriye ku ikaramu no ku byo (abamalayika n’abantu) bandika
Ku bw’ingabire za Nyagasani wawe (z’ubutumwa wahawe), ntabwo wowe (Muhamadi) uri umusazi
Kandi mu by’ukuri, uzahabwa ibihembo bidashira (ku bw’ingorane uhura nazo)
Rwose mu by’ukuri, ufite ubupfura buhambaye
Bityo, vuba aha uzabona n’abo (abahakanyi) babone
Umusazi muri mwe (uwo ari we)
Mu by’ukuri, Nyagasani wawe ni we uzi neza uwayobye inzira ye, kandi ni na we uzi neza abayobotse
Bityo, ntukumvire abahinyura
Bifuje ko waborohera (ukabakorera ibyo bashaka) na bo bakakorohera (ntibakurwanye)
Kandi ntukumvire buri (muntu) urahira kenshi unasuzuguritse
Umuneguzi wa cyane, unabunza amagambo
Ubuza ibyiza, urengera, umunyacyaha
Uw’umutima winangiye, akaba atanazwi inkomoko ye (kwa se)
N’ubwo yaba afite umutungo mwinshi n’urubyaro (rwinshi)
Iyo asomewe amagambo yacu, aravuga ati "Ni inkuru z’abo hambere
Tuzamushyiraho ikimenyetso ku mutonzi (w’izuru rye)
Mu by’ukuri, (abantu b’i Maka), twarabagerageje nk’uko twagerageje abantu bari bafite umurima ubwo barahiraga ko rwose bawusarura mu rukerera
Ariko ntibavuze In-sha-Allah (Imana nibishaka)
Bityo, ikiza (inkongi y’umuriro) giturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe kirawugota, mu gihe bo bari baryamye
(Umurima wabo) uhinduka nk’uruhira
Nuko bucyeye barahamagarana
Bagira bati "Nimuzindukire mu murima wanyu niba mugikomeje umugambi wo kuwusarura
Nuko bagenda bongorerana
Ko uyu munsi nta mukene n’umwe uri buwinjiremo (umurima)
Nuko bazinduka bagana (mu murima wabo) biyumvamo ubushobozi
Maze bawubonye baravuga bati "Mu by’ukuri, twayobye (inzira)
Ahubwo twimwe (umusaruro wawo, kubera umugambi wacu mubi wo kwima abakene)
Ushyira mu gaciro muri bo aravuga ati "Sinari nababwiye ko iyo muza gusingiza (Allah mukanamushimira, mukanavuga muti: In-sha-Allah, mutari guhura n’ibi byago)
Baravuga bati "Ubutagatifu ni ubwa Nyagasani wacu, mu by’ukuri twari inkozi z’ibibi
Nuko bamwe batangira guhindukirira abandi (bitana bamwana) bagayana
Baravuga bati "Mbega ishyano tubonye! Mu by’ukuri, twari abarengera (imbibi za Allah)
Hari ubwo Nyagasani wacu yadushumbusha (umurima) mwiza kuwuruta. Rwose twerekeje ibyifuzo byacu kwa Nyagasani wacu
Uko ni ko ibihano (bya Allah ku isi bimera)! Ariko ibihano byo ku munsi w’imperuka birahambaye cyane, iyaba bari babizi
Mu by’ukuri, abatinya Allah bazagororerwa Ijuru ryuje ingabire kwa Nyagasani wabo
Ese abicisha bugufi imbere ya Allah (Abayisilamu) twabafata kimwe n’inkozi z’ibibi
Ese mwabaye mute? Amahitamo yanyu ashingiye kuki
Cyangwa mwaba mufite igitabo mubisomamo (ko abicisha bugufi ari kimwe n’inkozi z’ibibi)
Ese mu by’ukuri, mwaba mufitemo (muri icyo gitabo) ibyo mutoranya
Cyangwa mwaba mufitanye natwe amasezerano ntakuka yo kuzabona ibyo muzifuza kuzageza ku munsi w’imperuka
Babaze (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ni nde muri bo wabyishingira (akabibera umuhamya)
Cyangwa se (abahakanyi) baba bafite ibigirwamana (bizabafasha ku munsi w’imperuka)? Ngaho nibazane ibyo bigirwamana byabo niba ari abanyakuri

(Ibuka) umunsi (ibintu bizaba bikomeye kandi biteye ubwoba), ubwo igice cyo hepfo cy’ukuguru (kwa Allah) kizagaragarizwa (ibiremwa), nuko (abahakanyi) bagahamagarirwa kubamira (Allah) ariko ntibabishobore
Bazaba bubitse amaso (kubera ikimwaro), batwikiriwe n’agasuzuguro. Nyamara bajyaga bahamagarirwa kubamira Allah ari bazima (ntibabikore kubera ubwibone)
Bityo, (yewe Muhamadi) ndekera uwo ari we wese uhinyura iyi nkuru (Qur’an). Rwose (abo bayihinyura) tuzabajyana buhoro buhoro (tubaganisha mu bihano) mu buryo batazi
Nzanabaha igihe (bibwire ko batazahanwa); mu by’ukuri, imigambi yanjye irakomeye
Cyangwa bibwira ko (wowe Muhamadi) ubasaba igihembo, none bakaba baremererwa n’ubwishyu
Cyangwa bibwira ko bazi ibitagaragara, bakaba bandika (ibyo bishakiye, badakeneye ibyo ubabwira)
Bityo (yewe Muhamadi), ihanganire itegeko rya Nyagasani wawe, kandi ntube nk’umwe wamizwe n’ifi (Umuhanuzi Yunusu) ubwo yadutakambiraga n’agahinda kenshi
Iyo bitaza kuba ingabire iturutse kwa Nyagasani we yamugezeho, (ifi) yari kumuruka ku musenyi wo ku nkombe kandi akabigayirwa
Nuko Nyagasani we aramutoranya, maze amushyira mu ntungane
Kandi iyo abahakanye bumvaga urwibutso (Qur’an), bakurebeshaga indoro ikomeye, bifuza ko wagwa igihunga kugira ngo bavuge bati "Rwose ni umusazi
Kandi (Qur’an) nta kindi iri cyo usibye kuba ari urwibutso ku biremwa byose
Ukuri kudakumirwa (umunsi w’izuka)
Ukuri kudakumirwa ni iki
Ni iki kizakubwira ukuri kudakumirwa
Aba Thamudu n’aba Adi bahinyuye umunsi w’imperuka
Aba Thamudu borekeshejwe urusaku ndengakamere
Naho aba Adi borekeshwa umuyaga uvuza ubuhuha, usenya
(Allah) yawubateje mu gihe cy’amajoro arindwi n’amanywa umunani bikurikiranye. Wabonaga abantu ari imirambo irambaraye imeze nk’ingiga z’ibiti by’imitende byaranduwe
Ese urabona hari n’umwe wasigaye muri bo
Farawo n’ababayeho mbere ye ndetse n’abo mu midugudu yabirinduwe (abantu ba Loti) bakoze ibyaha
Nuko bigomeka ku ntumwa ya Nyagasani wabo, maze (Allah) abahanisha ibihano bikaze
Mu by’ukuri, ubwo amazi yarengaga inkombe (mu gihe cy’umwuzure wo ku bwa Nuhu, abamwemeye) twabatwaye mu bwato
Kugira ngo tubigire urwibutso kuri mwe ndetse n’amatwi yumva abizirikane
Ubwo impanda izavuzwa inshuro imwe (ya mbere)
Isi n’imisozi bigaterurwa, bigahondwa inshuro imwe
Kuri uwo munsi, imperuka izaba igeze
N’ikirere kizasatagurika, maze uwo munsi kibe cyoroshye (ku buryo cyakwiyasagura)
N’abamalayika bazaba bakizengurutse (ikirere) impande zacyo. Kandi kuri uwo munsi abamalayika umunani biyongera kuri abo bazaba bahetse intebe y’icyubahiro (Ar’shi) ya Nyagasani wawe
Uwo munsi muzagezwa (imbere ya Allah). Nta kintu na kimwe cyanyu kizayoberana
Bityo, uzahabwa igitabo cye mu kuboko kw’iburyo, azavuga (aratira abandi) agira ati "Nimuze musome igitabo cyanjye
Rwose njye nari nzi neza ko nzahura n’ibarura ryanjye nk’iri (kubera ibikorwa byiza nakoze)
Azaba mu buzima bw’umunezero
Mu busitani buhebuje
Imbuto zabwo zizaba ziri bugufi (yabo)
(Bazabwirwa bati) "Nimurye munanywe kandi muryoherwe, ibyo ni ukubera ibyo mwakoze mu minsi yahise (mukiri ku isi)
Naho uzahabwa igitabo cye mu kuboko kw’ibumoso, azavuga (yicuza n’agahinda kenshi) ati "iyaba ntari mpawe iki gitabo cyanjye
Sinahure n’ibarura ryanjye
Iyaba urupfu (rwanjye napfuye mva ku isi) rwari rwo rwa burundu
Umutungo wanjye ntacyo wamariye
N’ubutware bwanjye bwabaye imfabusa
(Abarinzi b’umuriro bazabwirwa bati) "Mumufate mumubohe
Maze mumwinjize mu muriro
Nyuma mumuboheshe umunyururu ufite uburebure bwa Dhira’a142 mirongo irindwi
Mu by’ukuri, ntiyemeraga Allah w’ikirenga
Nta n’ubwo yajyaga ashishikariza (abantu) kugaburira abakene
None uyu munsi nta nshuti ari bugire (yamuvuganira cyangwa ngo imurinde ibihano)
Nta n’ibyo kurya (ari buhabwe) uretse amashyira (y’abantu bo mu muriro)
Nta bandi (bahabwa) ibyo biribwa uretse abanyabyaha
Rwose ndahiriye ku byo mureba
N’ibyo mutareba
Mu by’ukuri, iyi (Qur’an) ni ijambo (rya Allah risomwa) n’Intumwa yubahitse (Muhamadi)
Ntabwo ari imvugo y’umusizi. Ariko mwemera gake
Nta n’ubwo ari imvugo y’umupfumu. Ariko mwibuka gake
(Ahubwo ni igitabo) cyahishuwe giturutse kwa Nyagasani w’ibiremwa
N’iyo (Muhamadi) aza kugira ibyo aduhimbira (tutavuze)
Twari kumufatisha imbaraga n’ukuboko kw’iburyo
Maze tukamuca umutsi w’ijosi (uva ku mutima, utanga ubuzima)
Nta n’umwe muri mwe wari kugira icyo amumarira (ngo amutabare)
Kandi mu by’ukuri (Qur’an) ni urwibutso ku batinya Allah
Rwose tuzi neza ko muri mwe hari abahinyura (iyi Qur’an)
Kandi rwose (ku munsi w’imperuka, Qur’an) izaba amakuba ku bahakanyi
Kandi mu by’ukuri (Qur’an) ni ukuri kudashidikanywaho
Bityo, tagatifuza izina rya Nyagasani wawe, Uhambaye
Usaba yisabiye ko ibihano biza
(Nyamara ibyo bihano) ntibizagira gikumira ku bahakanyi
(Bizabageraho ku munsi w’imperuka) biturutse kwa Allah, Nyir’ubutagatifu bw’ikirenga
Abamalayika ndetse na Roho (Malayika Jibrilu) bazamuka iwe (Allah) mu gihe cy’umunsi umwe ungana n’imyaka ibihumbi mirongo itanu (ya hano ku isi, abandi batari bo bakoresha muri urwo rugendo)
Bityo, ihangane (yewe Muhamadi) wifashishije ukwihangana kwiza
Mu by’ukuri, bo babona (imperuka) iri kure
Nyamara twe tukabona iri hafi
Umunsi ikirere kizaba nk’umushongi w’umuringa
N’imisozi ikaba nk’ipamba
Kandi nta nshuti izigera ibaza iby’inshuti yayo
N’ubwo bazaba barebana (ndetse bakanamenyana, ariko ntacyo bazamarirana). Kubera ibihano by’uwo munsi, umunyabyaha azifuza gutangaho inshungu abana be
Umugore we, umuvandimwe we
N’umuryango we yahungiragaho (akiri ku isi igihe ahuye n’ibimuteye ubwoba)
Ndetse n’abari mu isi bose (azifuza kubatangaho inshungu) kugira ngo arokoke
Ariko ntacyo bizamumarira! Ahubwo bizaba umuriro ugurumana
Ukuraho uruhu rw’umubiri
Uzaba uhamagara uwo ari we wese wateraga umugongo akanirengagiza (ukuri gukubiye muri Qur’an)
Akanakusanya (umutungo) akawuhunika (ntawukoreshe mu nzira ya Allah)
Mu by’ukuri, umuntu yaremanywe ukutihangana
Iyo ikibi kimugezeho, ariheba cyane
Naho icyiza cyamugeraho, akaba umunyabugugu cyane
Uretse abakora amasengesho
Babandi bahozaho amasengesho yabo
Na babandi bagena umugabane uzwi (Zakat) mu mitungo yabo
Wagenewe usaba n’uwiyumanganyije (nyamara akeneye ubufasha)
Na babandi bemera umunsi w’ibihembo
Na babandi batinya ibihano bya Nyagasani wabo
Kubera ko mu by’ukuri, nta n’umwe warokoka ibihano bya Nyagasani wabo
Na babandi barinda ubwambure bwabo (ubusambanyi)
Uretse ku bagore babo cyangwa se ku bo bafiteho ububasha (abaja). Mu by’ukuri, bo ntibabigayirwa
Ariko abazashaka (kwinezeza) ku batari abo (bavuzwe), rwose abo bazaba batandukiriye
Na babandi barinda ibyo baragijwe ndetse bakubahiriza n’amasezerano yabo
Na babandi batanga ubuhamya bw’ukuri
Na babandi bahozaho amasengesho yabo (ku bihe byagenwe)
Abo bazajya mu busitani (Ijuru) kandi bubashywe
Nonese ni iyihe mpamvu ituma abahakanyi bakugana (yewe Muhamadi) bihuta (bashaka kukumva, kandi batakwemera)
(Bicaye) mu matsinda iburyo n’ibumoso bwawe
Ese buri wese muri bo yibwira ko azinjira mu Ijuru ryuje ingabire
Ntabwo ari ko bimeze! Mu by’ukuri, twabaremye tubakomoye mu byo bazi143 (ariko banga kwemera)
Bityo, ndahiye ku izina rya Nyagasani w’Iburasirazuba bwose n’Iburengerazuba bwose, ko rwose dushoboye
Kubasimbuza abeza kubarusha, kandi ntibyatunanira
Bityo, bareke bavuge ibidafite umumaro, banikinire kugeza ubwo bazahura n’umunsi wabo basezeranyijwe
Umunsi bazasohoka mu mva zabo bihuta, nk’uko bihutaga bagana ibigirwamana byabo
Bazaba bubitse amaso (kubera ikimwaro), batwikiriwe n’agasuzuguro. Uwo ni wo munsi basezeranyijwe
Mu by’ukuri, twohereje Nuhu ku bantu be (tugira tuti) "Burira abantu bawe mbere y’uko ibihano bibabaza bibageraho
(Nuhu) aravuga ati "Bantu banjye! Mu by’ukuri, njye ndi umuburizi wanyu ugaragara
(Ubaburira ko) mugomba kugaragira Allah (wenyine), mumutinye kandi munanyumvire
(Ibyo nimubikora, Allah) azabababarira ibyaha byanyu, anabahe kubaho kugeza igihe cyagenwe. Mu by’ukuri, iyo igihe ntarengwa (cyo gupfa) Allah yagennye kigeze nticyongerwa, iyaba mwari mubizi
(Nuhu) aravuga ati "Nyagasani wanjye! Mu by’ukuri, nahamagariye abantu banjye ijoro n’amanywa (ko bagomba gusenga Imana imwe)
Ariko uguhamagara kwanjye ntacyo kwabongereye uretse guhunga (ukuri)
Kandi mu by’ukuri, buri uko nabahamagariraga (kwemera Imana imwe) kugira ngo ubababarire ibyaha byabo, bashyiraga intoki mu matwi, bakitwikira imyambaro, bagatsimbarara ndetse bakanibona cyane
Hanyuma kandi nabahamagaye ku mugaragaro
Hanyuma nanabatangarije (mu ijwi riranguruye) ndetse nanababwira mu ibanga
Narababwiye nti "Nimusabe imbabazi Nyagasani wanyu, mu by’ukuri ni we uhebuje mu kubabarira ibyaha
(Kugira ngo) azaboherereze imvura nyinshi (ihagije)
Anabongerere imitungo n’urubyaro, abahe ubusitani (Ijuru) ndetse abahe n’imigezi (yaryo)
Kubera iki mudaha Allah icyubahiro kimukwiye
Kandi ari we wabaremye mu byiciro (bitandukanye)
Ese ntimubona uburyo Allah yaremye ibirere birindwi bigerekeranye
Hanyuma akabishyiramo ukwezi akakugira urumuri ndetse n’izuba akarigira itara
Kandi Allah yabakujije abakuye mu butaka nk’ibimera
Hanyuma azabubasubizamo (igihe cyo gupfa) ndetse anabubasohoremo (ku munsi w’izuka)
Kandi Allah ni we wabagiriye isi nk’isaso
Kugira ngo muyigendeho (mugendera) mu mayira magari
Nuhu aravuga ati "Nyagasani wanjye! Mu by’ukuri, (abantu banjye) banyigometseho, banakurikira uwo imitungo n’abana bitagize icyo byongerera uretse igihombo
Nuko (abantu be) bacura umugambi mubi (wo kubangamira ubutumwa bwe)
Baranavuga bati "Rwose ntimuzareke imana zanyu, kandi ntimuzareke (gusenga) Wadan, Suwa’a, Yagutha, Ya’uqa ndetse na Nasra
(Nuhu aravuga ati) "Kandi rwose (ibyo bigirwamana) byayobeje benshi. Bityo (yewe Allah), ntuzagire ikindi wongerera ababangikanyamana kitari ubuyobe
Kubera ibyaha byabo, baroretswe kandi bazinjizwa mu muriro, ndetse ntibazigera babona ababatabara batari Allah
Nuhu aravuga ati "Nyagasani wanjye! Ntuzagire n’umwe muri aba bahakanyi usiga ku isi
Kuko mu by’ukuri nubareka, bazayobya abagaragu bawe, kandi ntibazigera babyara abandi batari abanyabyaha b’abahakanyi

(Nuhu aravuga ati) "Nyagasani wanjye! Mbabarira, njye n’ababyeyi banjye, n’uzinjira mu nzu yanjye ari umwemeramana, ndetse n’abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi. Kandi ntuzagire ikindi wongerera abahakanyi kitari ukorama
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Nahishuriwe ko hari itsinda ry’amajini ryumvise (Qur’an isomwa), nuko rikavuga riti "Mu by’ukuri, twumvise Qur’an itangaje
Iyobora iganisha ku kuri, nuko turayemera kandi ntituzigera tubangikanya Nyagasani wacu (Allah) n’icyo ari cyo cyose
Kandi ko icyubahiro cy’ikirenga ari icya Nyagasani wacu, utarigeze umugore cyangwa umwana
Kandi ko umunyabwenge buke muri twe (Shitani) yajyaga avuga ibidahwitse kuri Allah
Kandi mu by’ukuri, twakekaga ko abantu n’amajini badashobora guhimbira Allah ikinyoma
Kandi mu by’ukuri, mu bantu hari abagabo bajyaga biyambaza amajini y’igitsinagabo, ariko (ibyo) byongereraga (abo bantu) gukora ibyaha (ndetse n’ayo majini bikayongerera kwibona)
Kandi ko mu by’ukuri, batekerezaga nk’uko mwatekerezaga ko Allah atazigera agira n’umwe azura
Kandi twagerageje kugera mu kirere dusanga cyuzuye abarinzi bakomeye ndetse n’ibishirira
Kandi mu by’ukuri, twajyaga tuhagira ibyicaro kugira ngo twumvirize (ibivugirwa mu Ijuru), ariko ubu uwagerageza kumviriza yahura n’igishirira kimwubikiriye
Kandi ntitwigeze tumenya niba hari ikibi giteganyirizwa abari ku isi, cyangwa niba Nyagasani wabo abifuriza icyiza
Kandi ko muri twe hari abakora ibyiza n’abatameze batyo. Turi amatsinda afite amayira (imyizerere) atandukanye
Kandi twizeraga ko tudashobora kunanira Allah (aramutse ashatse kuduhana) ku isi, cyangwa ngo tube twagira aho tumuhungira
Kandi ko mu by’ukuri, ubwo twumvaga umuyoboro (Qur’an) twarawukurikiye. Kandi uwemeye Nyagasani we, ntatinya kugabanyirizwa (ibihembo bye) cyangwa ngo abe yatinya kongererwa (ibihano)
Kandi ko muri twe hari mo abicishije bugufi (Abayisilamu) n’abatannye. Nyamara abicishije bugufi ni bo bagannye inzira igororotse
Naho abatannye bazaba inkwi z’umuriro wa Jahanamu
Kandi ko iyo (abahakanyi) baza kuyoboka inzira igororotse (bakayishikamamo), rwose twari kubaha amazi (imvura) menshi (kandi y’umugisha)
Kugira ngo tuyabageragereshe. Kandi uzirengagiza urwibutso rwa Nyagasani we, azamuhanisha ibihano bihambaye
Kandi ko imisigiti yose ari iya Allah (wenyine). Bityo, ntimukagire undi musaba mumubangikanyije na Allah
Kandi ubwo umugaragu wa Allah (Muhamadi) yahagurukaga amusenga, (amajini) yabaga amuzengurutse (kugira ngo yumve Intumwa isoma Qur’an)
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Mu by’ukuri, njye nsaba Nyagasani wanjye wenyine nta wundi mubangikanyije na we
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Mu by’ukuri, nta bubasha mfite bwo kuba nagira ikibi mbakorera, cyangwa ngo mbe nabayobora (mu nzira igororotse)
Vuga uti "Mu by’ukuri, nta n’umwe wandinda (ibihano bya) Allah (ndamutse mwigometseho), ndetse nta n’ahandi nabona ubuhungiro hatari kuri we
(Umurimo wanjye nta wundi) usibye gusohoza (ukuri) n’ubutumwa biturutse kwa Allah. Ariko uzigomeka kuri Allah n’intumwa ye, azahanishwa umuriro wa Jahanamu azabamo ubuziraherezo
Kugeza ubwo (ababangikanyamana) bazabona ibyo basezeranyijwe, ni bwo bazamenya ufite abatabazi b’abanyantege nke n’ufite bake
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Sinzi niba (ibihano) musezeranywa biri bugufi cyangwa niba Nyagasani wanjye azabiha igihe kirekire
Ni we (wenyine) mumenyi w’ibitagaragara kandi nta n’umwe ajya ahishurira ibye
Uretse uwo yishimiye mu ntumwa ze, akamwoherereza abarinzi (abamalayika) bamugenda imbere n’inyuma
(Ibyo Allah abikora) kugira ngo amenye ko (Intumwa) zasohoje neza ubutumwa bwa Nyagasani wazo. Kandi (ko Allah) azi neza ibyo zitunze ndetse azi byimazeyo umubare wa buri kintu
Yewe uwiyoroshe (uvugwa aha ni Intumwa Muhamadi)
Byuka (usenge) nijoro, uretse igice gito (cyaryo)
Kimwe cya kabiri cyaryo cyangwa igito kuri cyo
Cyangwa wongereho gato. Unasome Qur’an neza (mu ijwi rituje kandi ryiza)
Mu by’ukuri, tuzaguhishurira ijambo riremereye (ari ryo Qur’an ikubiyemo amategeko n’amabwiriza)
Mu by’ukuri, amasengesho y’ijoro ni ingirakamaro (ku mutima) ndetse anatuma (umuntu atekereza ku magambo ya Allah, atuje)
Mu by’ukuri, ku manywa uba uhugiye muri byinshi
Kandi ujye wibuka izina rya Nyagasani wawe unamwiyegurire utizigama
Nyagasani w’Uburasirazuba n’Uburengerazuba; nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa itari we. Bityo, mugire umurinzi (wawe)
Unihanganire ibyo (abo bahakanyi) bavuga, kandi unabitarure mu buryo bwiza
Maze undekere abahinyura (amagambo yanjye); bahawe ingabire (yo kubaho mu buzima bwiza), unabarindirize igihe gito
Rwose dufite iminyururu n’umuriro ugurumana (byo kuzabahanisha ku munsi w’imperuka)
N’ibyo kurya bizabaniga ndetse n’ibihano bibabaza
Umunsi isi n’imisozi bizatigita, maze imisozi ikaba nk’ikirundo cy’umusenyi wanyanyagijwe
Mu by’ukuri, twaboherereje Intumwa (Muhamadi) ngo ibabere umuhamya nk’uko twoherereje Farawo Intumwa (Musa)
Ariko Farawo yigometse ku ntumwa (Musa), nuko turamufata tumuhanisha ibihano bikomeye
Ni gute mwakwirinda ibihano kandi muhakana umunsi uzagira abana abasaza (kubera uko uzaba uteye ubwoba)
Ubwo ikirere kizasatagurika. Isezerano rye (Allah) rizasohora nta gushidikanya
Mu by’ukuri, ibi ni urwibutso. Bityo ushaka nayoboke inzira imuganisha kwa Nyagasani we

Mu by’ukuri, Nyagasani wawe azi ko wowe (Muhamadi) n’itsinda muri kumwe mubyuka mugasenga hafi bibiri bya gatatu by’ijoro, cyangwa icya kabiri cyaryo, cyangwa se icya gatatu cyaryo. Kandi Allah ni we ugena indeshyo y’ijoro n’amanywa. Azi ko mutari gushobora gusenga ijoro ryose, bityo yabagiriye impuhwe (araborohereza). Ku bw’ibyo, mujye musoma ibiboroheye muri Qur’an. Azi ko muri mwe hazabamo abarwayi, abandi bakaba bari mu ngendo bashakisha ingabire za Allah, naho abandi bakazaba bari ku rugamba barwana mu nzira ya Allah. Bityo, mujye musoma ibiboroheye muri yo, muhozeho amasengesho, mutange amaturo, munagurize Allah inguzanyo nziza (mutanga kubera we). Kandi icyiza cyose mwiteganyirije imbere, muzagisanga kwa Allah ari cyiza kurushaho kandi gifite ibihembo bihebuje. Munasabe imbabazi Allah, kuko mu by’ukuri Allah ari Nyirimpuhwe, Nyirimbabazi
Yewe uwitwikiriye (uvugwa aha ni Intumwa Muhamadi)
Haguruka uburire (ibiremwa)
Unahe ikuzo Nyagasani wawe
Unasukure imyambaro yawe
Unitarure ibigirwamana
Ntukanatange (ikintu) ugamije indonke
Kandi ujye wihangana kubera Nyagasani wawe
Ubwo impanda izavuzwa
Uwo munsi uzaba ari umunsi ukomeye
Uzaba utoroheye abahakanyi
(Yewe Muhamadi) ndekera uwo naremye ari wenyine (uvugwa aha ni Al Walid bun al Mughirat)
Nkamuha imitungo itubutse
N’urubyaro rumukikije
Nkanamworohereza ubuzima
Nyuma y’ibyo byose, akaba yifuza ko namwongera
Oya! Mu by’ukuri, yajyaga ahinyura amagambo yacu cyane
Nzamunaniza muhanisha ibihano bikomeye
Mu by’ukuri, yatekereje (ku byo avuga) maze afata umwanzuro (wo gutuka Allah n’Intumwa ye ndetse na Qur’an)
Bityo, navumwe kubera umwanzuro yafashe
Niyongere avumwe kubera umwanzuro yafashe
Nuko (yubura amaso) areba (abari bamukikije)
Maze azinga umunya, akambya agahanga
Nuko atera umugongo (ukuri), maze aribona
Aravuga ati "Ibi (Muhamadi yigisha) nta kindi biri cyo uretse ko ari uburozi (akomora ku barozi bo hambere bakomeye)
Ibi (Muhamadi yigisha) nta kindi biri cyo uretse ko ari amagambo y’umuntu
Nzamwinjiza mu muriro
N’iki cyakumenyesha uwo muriro
Ntacyo ureka ndetse nta n’icyo usigaza
Utwika imibiri ukanayishiririza
Urinzwe (n’abamalayika) cumi n’icyenda

Kandi nta bandi twagize abarinzi b’umuriro batari abamalayika. Ndetse twanashyizeho umubare wabo (cumi n’icyenda) kugira ngo tugerageze abahakanyi, no kugira ngo abahawe ibitabo bemere badashidikanya (ko Qur’an ari ukuri kuko ihuriye kuri uwo mubare wanditse mu bitabo byabo); ndetse no kugira ngo abemeramana barusheho kwemera, no kugira ngo abahawe igitabo n’abemeramana batagira ugushidikanya (ku byo bemeye), ndetse no kugira ngo abafite uburwayi (bw’uburyarya) mu mitima n’abahakanyi bavuge bati " Allah yari agamije iki mu gutanga uru rugero?" Uko ni ko Allah arekera mu buyobe uwo ashatse akanayobora uwo ashatse. Kandi nta wamenya ingabo za Nyagasani wawe utari we. Kandi uyu (muriro) nta kindi uri cyo usibye ko ari urwibutso ku bantu
Oya si ko biri! Ndahiriye ku kwezi
No ku ijoro igihe ricyeye
No ku gitondo igihe gitangaje
Mu by’ukuri, uwo (muriro) ni kimwe mu (byago) bihambaye
Ukaba n’umuburizi ku bantu
K’uwo ari we wese muri mwe ushaka kujya imbere (yiyegereza Nyagasani we) cyangwa gusubira inyuma (amwigomekaho)
Buri wese azafungirwa (mu muriro) bitewe n’ibibi yakoze
Uretse abantu b’iburyo (b’abemera nyakuri)
Bazaba bari mu busitani (Ijuru), babazanya
Ku byerekeye inkozi z’ibibi, (maze bazibaze bati)
Ni iki cyabateye kuba muri mu muriro
(Izo nkozi z’ibibi) zizavuga ziti "Ntitwari bamwe mu basenga
Nta n’ubwo twajyaga tugaburira abakene
Kandi twajyaga tugirana ibiganiro n’abavuga ibidafite umumaro
Ndetse twajyaga duhinyura umunsi w’ibihembo (imperuka)
Kugeza ubwo ukuri kudashidikanywaho (urupfu) kutugezeho
Bityo, nta buvugizi bw’abavugizi buzagira icyo bubamarira
Nonese ni iyihe mpamvu ituma (abahakanyi) batera umugongo urwibutso
Bameze nk’imparage ziruka (zifite ubwoba)
Zihunga intare
Ahubwo buri wese muri bo aba ashaka ko yahishurirwa ibitabo birambuye (bishimangira ko Isilamu ari idini ry’ukuri)
Oya si ko biri! Ahubwo ntibatinya umunsi w’imperuka
Oya si ko biri! Mu by’ukuri, iyi (Qur’an) ni urwibutso
Bityo, ushaka (ko imubera urwibutso) nayibuke (ayisoma, anatekereza ku nyigisho ziyikubiyemo)
Kandi ntibashobora kwibuka keretse Allah abishatse. Ni we ukwiriye gutinywa, ndetse ni na we utanga imbabazi
Ndahiriye ku munsi w’izuka
Nanarahiriye ku mutima (w’umwemeramana) ugaya nyirawo (kubera guteshuka ku nzira igororotse)
Ese umuntu (w’umuhakanyi) akeka ko tutazashobora gukoranya amagufa ye (tumuzura)
Nibyo! Dushoboye no kuringaniza imitwe y’intoki ze (imirongo iyiriho igasubira nk’uko yari imeze mbere)
Ahubwo umuntu (ahakana izuka) ashaka icyatuma akomeza kwibera mu bwangizi
Arabaza (akerensa) ati "Uwo munsi w’izuka uzaba ryari
(Uwo munsi uzaba) igihe amaso azakanaguzwa (kubera ubwoba)
N’ukwezi kukazima
Ndetse izuba n’ukwezi bizahurizwa hamwe (kimwe kinjire mu kindi)
Icyo gihe umuntu azavuga ati "Ni he ho guhungira
(Azabwirwa ati) "Oya! Ntaho guhungira hahari
Kuri uwo munsi, igarukiro rizaba ari kwa Nyagasani wawe (wenyine)
Kuri uwo munsi, umuntu azabwirwa ibyo yakoze mbere n’ibyo yaherutse (byaba ibyiza cyangwa ibibi)
Ahubwo umuntu azibera umuhamya w’ibyo yakoze (kuko ingingo z’umubiri we ari zo zizamushinja ibyo yakoze)
Kabone n’ubwo yatanga impamvu ze (agamije kwiregura)
(Yewe Muhamadi), ntukanyeganyeze ururimi rwawe ugira ubwira (bwo kuvuga ibyo uhishurirwa, ahubwo ujye utega amatwi wumve ibyo uba uhishurirwa na Malayika Jiburilu)
Mu by’ukuri, ni twe tuzayikusanyiriza (mu gituza cyawe) kandi ni natwe (tuzakwigisha) kuyisoma (Qur’an)
Nituyigusomera (binyuze kuri Malayika wacu), ujye ukurikira isomwa ryayo
Hanyuma ni twe (Allah) tuzayigusobanurira
(Ibyo mukeka ko mutazazurwa mukanabazwa ibyo mwakoze) si ko biri; ahubwo mukunda ubuzima bwo ku isi butaramba
Mukirengagiza imperuka
Kuri uwo munsi, uburanga (bw’abemeramana) buzaba burabagirana
Bureba Nyagasani wabwo
Kuri uwo munsi kandi, uburanga (bw’abahakanyi) buzaba bwijimye
Bibaza ko bagiye guhura n’ishyano
Oya! Ahubwo iyo (roho) igeze mu ngoto (igihe cyo gupfa)
Hanyuma hakavugwa ngo "Ni nde wamutabara (akamurinda urupfu)
Nuko (ugiye gupfa) akamenya ko igihe cyo gutandukana (gupfa) cyageze
Maze (kubera ububabare bwo gukurwamo roho), ukuguru kwe kuzahuzwa n’ukundi
Kuri uwo munsi, (wowe muntu ukuwemo roho) uzerekezwa kwa Nyagasani wawe
Ariko (umuhakanyi) ntiyigeze yemera ndetse nta n’ubwo yigeze asenga
Ahubwo yahinyuye (Qur’an) maze ayitera umugongo
Hanyuma akagenda yibona yerekeza mu muryango we
Ufite akaga (yewe muntu w’umuhakanyi)! Kandi nanone ufite akaga
Nanone ufite akaga (yewe muntu w’umuhakanyi)! Kandi nanone ufite akaga
Ese umuntu yibwira ko azarekwa gusa (atabajijwe ibyo yakoze ngo abihemberwe cyangwa ngo abihanirwe)
Ese ntiyari intanga zisohorwa
Hanyuma akaba urusoro rw’amaraso, maze Allah akamurema, akanamutunganya (akaba umuntu wuzuye)
Maze akamuremamo ibitsina bibiri: ikigabo n’ikigore
Ese uwo (Allah ukora ibyo) si we ushoboye kuzura abapfuye
Ese nta gihe kirekire cyabayeho umuntu ari ikintu kitazwi
Mu by’ukuri, twaremye umuntu mu ntanga zivanze (iz’umugabo n’iz’umugore) kugira ngo tumugerageze. (Ni yo mpamvu) twamuhaye kumva no kubona
Mu by’ukuri, twamweretse inzira; abishatse (yahitamo kwemera) agashimira cyangwa agahakana
Mu by’ukuri, abahakanyi twabateguriye (kuzabahanisha) iminyururu, ingoyi ndetse n’umuriro ugurumana
Mu by’ukuri, abakiranutsi bazanywera mu kirahuri (cya divayi idasindisha) ivanze (n’amazi y’isoko y’umugezi wo mu ijuru witwa) Kafuur
(Iyo Kafuur) ni isoko y’amazi abagaragu ba Allah bazanywaho, ikazajya ivubura amazi menshi (bakayerekeza aho bashatse)
(Abo bakiranutsi) ni abesa imihigo (yabo bahigiye Allah), bakanatinya umunsi ikibi cyazakwira hose (umunsi w’imperuka)
Bakanaha amafunguro abakene, imfubyi n’imbohe, kabone n’iyo nabo baba bayakeneye
(Bavuga bati) "Rwose, turabagaburira kubera gushaka kwishimirwa na Allah. Nta nyiturano cyangwa ishimwe tubashakaho
Rwose dutinya umunsi ukomeye kandi uzaba urimo ingorane, uturutse kwa Nyagasani wacu, uzatuma (uburanga bw’abahakanyi) bwijima
Bityo, Allah azabarinda ibibi by’uwo munsi, kandi azabaha umucyo (mu buranga) ndetse n’ibyishimo
Azanabagororera ijuru n’imyambaro y’ihariri kubera ko barangwaga no kwihangana
Bazaba begamye ku bitanda bitatse, (kandi mu Ijuru) ntibazigera bahabona ubushyuhe bw’izuba cyangwa imbeho bikabije
Kandi igicucu (cy’ibiti byo mu ijuru) kizaba kibegereye, ndetse n’imbuto zabyo zizabegerezwa
Bazazengurutswamo amasahane ya Feza (arimo ibiribwa byiza) n’ibikombe bikozwe mu birahuri
Ibirahuri bikoze muri Feza, byuzuye neza (bijyanye n’ibyifuzo bya buri wese)
Bazanahabwa ikirahuri (cya divayi idasindisha) ivanze na tangawizi
Izavomwa mu isoko ryitwa Salisabila
Bazaba bazengurukwamo n’abana b’abahungu bahoraho (badasaza cyangwa ngo bapfe, babaha amafunguro), ubabonye wagira ngo ni inigi zishashagirana (Lu’ulu’u) zanyanyagijwe
Kandi nunarebayo (mu Ijuru) uzabona ingabire (zitagereranywa) ndetse n’ubwami buhebuje
Bazaba bambaye imyambaro y’icyatsi kibitsi ikoze mu ihariri yorohereye n’iremereye. Bazanambikirwamo ibikomo bya Feza kandi Nyagasani wabo azabaha ikinyobwa gisukuye
(Bazanabwirwa bati) "Mu by’ukuri, ibi ni ibihembo byanyu, kandi umuhate wanyu warakiriwe
Mu by’ukuri, (yewe Muhamadi) ni twe twaguhishuriye Qur’an mu byiciro
Bityo, ihanganire itegeko rya Nyagasani wawe, kandi ntuzumvire umunyabyaha cyangwa umuhakanyi muri bo
Kandi ujye wibuka izina rya Nyagasani wawe mu gitondo no ku gicamunsi
Na nijoro umwubamire kandi unamusingize igihe kirekire mu ijoro
Mu by’ukuri, abo (bahakanyi) bakunda ubuzima bwo ku isi butaramba, bakirengagiza umunsi uremereye (w’ibihano)
Ni twe twabaremye dukomeza ingingo zabo. Kandi tubishatse twabasimbuza abandi bameze nka bo
Mu by’ukuri, iyi (mirongo ya Qur’an) ni urwibutso, bityo ushaka nayoboke inzira imuganisha kwa Nyagasani we
Kandi ntacyo mwashaka (ngo mukigereho) keretse Allah abishatse. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje, Ushishoza
Yinjiza mu mpuhwe ze uwo ashatse. Naho inkozi z’ibibi yaziteguriye ibihano bibabaza
Ndahiriye ku (miyaga) yoherezwa ikurikiranye
No ku (miyaga) y’inkubi
No ku (miyaga) itwara ibicu n’imvura
No ku (mirongo ya Qur’an) itandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma
No ku (bamalayika) bazanira amahishurirwa (intumwa za Allah)
Kugira ngo bivaneho urwitwazo cyangwa kugira ngo biburire
Mu by’ukuri, ibyo musezeranywa bizasohora
Igihe inyenyeri zizakurwaho (urumuri rwazo rukazima)
N’igihe ikirere kizasandazwa
N’igihe imisozi izariturwa
N’igihe intumwa zizakoranyirizwa hamwe ku gihe cyagenwe (kugira ngo zitange ubuhamya ku bo zatumweho)
Ni uwuhe munsi (ibyo byose) byarindirijwe
Ni ku munsi w’urubanza (ubwo Allah azakiranura ibiremwa)
Ni iki cyakumenyesha umunsi w’urubanza
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Ese ntitworetse abo hambere
Nuko tukabakurikiza abo hanyuma
Uko ni ko tugenza inkozi z’ibibi
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Ese ntitwabaremye mu mazi asuzuguritse
Nuko tukayashyira mu cyicaro gitekanye (nyababyeyi)
Kugeza igihe kizwi
Nuko tukagena (igihe umwana avukira) kandi ni twe duhebuje mu kugena
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Ese isi ntitwayigize ihuriro
Ry’abazima (bayituyeho) n’abapfuye (bayishyinguwemo)
Hanyuma tukanayishyiramo imisozi miremire, ndetse tukabaha n’amazi y’urubogobogo
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
(Abahakanyi bazabwirwa bati) "Ngaho nimujye (mu muriro wa Jahanamu) mwajyaga muhinyura
Ngaho nimujye mu gicucu (cy’umwotsi wa Jahanamu) kigabanyijemo amashami atatu
Nta bwugamo gitanga ndetse nta n’ubwo kirinda ikibatsi cy’umuriro
Mu by’ukuri, (uwo muriro) utera ibishashi bingana n’inyubako nini
(Ibyo bishashi) bimeze nk’ingamiya z’amagaju
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Uwo uzaba ari umunsi (batazashobora kugira) icyo bavuga
Kandi nta n’uburenganzira bazahabwa bwo kugira urwitwazo batanga
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Uwo uzaba ari umunsi w’urubanza, ubwo (mwe) n’abo hambere tuzaba twabakoranyirije hamwe
Niba hari amayeri mufite (yo guhunga ibihano byanjye), ngaho nimuyankorere
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Mu by’ukuri, abatinya Allah (ku munsi w’imperuka) bazaba bari hagati y’ibicucu (by’ibiti byo mu ijuru) ndetse n’amasoko (atemba)
(Bazaba bafitemo) n’imbuto (z’amoko anyuranye) bazajya bifuza
(Bazabwirwa bati) "Nimurye, munywe kandi mugubwe neza kubera ibyo mwakoze
Mu by’ukuri, uko ni ko tugororera abakoze neza
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
(Yemwe bahakanyi) "Nimurye munishimishe by’igihe gito (mu buzima bwo ku isi), kuko rwose muri inkozi z’ibibi
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
N’iyo babwiwe bati "Nimwuname (musenge)!" Ntabwo bunama (ngo basenge)
Ibihano bikaze bizaba kuri babandi bahinyura (umunsi w’izuka)
Nonese nyuma y’iyi (Qur’an) ni ayahe magambo yandi bazemera
